title: Emma's Secret
description: Tired of putting up with her abstinent boyfriend, Emma decides to seduce ex-model, Michael Andrews, her incredibly sexy step-father. She cleverly devises a plan to make his fantasies come true, but Emma quickly discovers that her step-father is a virile man who knows what he wants, and he isn’t about to let her call the shots…WARNING! Emma’s Secret is an 9,000 word adult story. It deals with taboo subject matter and detailed sex between consenting adults.
author: Victoria  Kelley
